attributes.title: VERY ATROCIOUS
attributes.review:
This app made my phone burn up and it literally killed my pet rat RIP chunksss , this app is so slow soooo freaking slow , I went to get chicken nuggets from the McDonald’s head quarters and I came back and it was still loading and it ASKEd for my LOCATION they are trying to track people down and get all your information, THIS IS NOT OKAY , AND DONALD TRUMP doesn’t Respeat WOMEN NOR PEOPLES PRIVACY Also let’s not support a pedofileeee 
#SAVE BARRON #LONGLIVECHUNKS #EQUALITY

attributes.title: Slow and glitchy
attributes.review: I’m really disappointed with this app. I wanted to see my waifu, but instead it kept exiting out on its own. When I managed to get through the loading screen, it would take forever to switch between pages, and would scroll up to the top by itself. Very frustrating.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This stupid thing messed my phone up and now it won’t turn on I have no idea what’s going on but my pet chinchilla deffinetly didn’t like this app do not download it it gives u virus and a lot of bugs ni seriously after I downloaded it their where a lot of bugs in my house and I got corona which is a virus so just don’t install it trash

attributes.title: This app is TERRIBLE!!
attributes.review: I had got the app to simply stay up to date with the situations happening regarding trump, but not only is the app super slow and doesn’t give much information at all, but it also has been making my phone glitch. My phone was fine before but as soon as I downloaded the app my phone was glitching left and right. ITS UNBELIEVABLE HOW HORRIBLE THIS APP IS! I’m UPSET

attributes.title: Traumatized!!!
attributes.review: Downloaded the app and when I opened it I immediately saw a man that looked like a cheeto. He pointed at me and said if I didn’t vote for me he would deport me because of my brown skin although I’m a US citizen and I was born on “us ground” which we all know is stolen land:) it even smells like it but now I am traumatized for the rest of my life I thought IT would pop out of my phone and harass me!!!!

attributes.title: Renegade
attributes.review:
So I got the trump app and after 15 months it finally downloaded when I opened it 69 Oompa-Loompas came out of my phone and out of my window and then I started to do TickTock and I asked if they wanted to join they said no so theyBrought this big orange Oompa Loompa name Trump through the window and I started doing TickTock dances because he was going to shut it down then I did renegade 
In his face

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: My name is Emma Penny bottom around 74 years ago I had an orange tree and one orange fell off and rolled out of my garden I had lost it for so many years and now that I’m 96 I saw my orange on TV and he was president I had no idea oranges could grow arms and legs in a small weenie but all in all the app is horrible it’s not made for oranges at all how does orange even know how to speak English terrible terrible app

attributes.title: Not even worth it .
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and when i opened it froze my phone for a few days and i had to go to verizon to get it fixed and they still couldn’t fix it. I had to get a new phone and pay lots of money for it and it froze my phone when i tried to delete so i had to get my phone fixed🤦🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: so disappointed
attributes.review: i got this app to stay up to date with our fearless leader. the media is always spreading fake news about him & i only trust information coming from the president. but unfortunately the app started invading my phone the way the illegal immigrants are invading our country. every time i opened my phone it would open to this app. when i was on tik tok slamming on the snowflakes the app randomly opened. same with all my other apps. eventually this app was the only one that would open. i’m not sure what happened but i suspect george soros & the radical communist democrats had something to do with it

attributes.title: Disappointed ✨🧚‍♀️🌸🤩🌿💓
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get updates about our cheeto- skinned president and was very disappointed. Last night the king oompa loompa showed up to my door now my app has crashed and my phone is broken. I also had to enter information like a dating app which is a little concerning. 💫🛍🌱🐳when miley cyrus said nobody’s perfect 🌺🎀🦋☘️ she meant you😘💖🧚‍♀️🔮 😺
